title: ∙ Hillary calls to the end of the U.S. government and one government in the Western Hemisphere
subtitle: In an e-mail published by WikiLeaks, Hillary Clinton said that she had dreamed of "a common market for the toxic cover," not of abolishing the United States government.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Hillary Clinton wants to put an end to the U.S. as we know it for the benefit of the Solar Government.
